Contract representing a route for waste picking

    export

  • Method Details

    • getRoute

      IRecyclingBin[] getRoute​(double kilometersLimit, double durationLimit, double percentageCriteria, double maxCapacity)
      Calculates and returns the route based on the read measurements
      Parameters:
      kilometersLimit - The maximum kilometers to travel (-1 means unlimited)
      durationLimit - The maximum kilometers to travel (-1 means unlimited)
      percentageCriteria - The percentage value in which a container should be collected)
      maxCapacity - The max quantity (kilograms) of the vehicle used for collecting waste
      Returns:
      the route (ordered collection of path) instances based on the measurements

    • getTotalDistance

      double getTotalDistance​(IRecyclingBin[] route)

    • getTotalDuration

      double getTotalDuration​(IRecyclingBin[] route)
